title: The Unseen Hand
goal: Show Valerius's active opposition and increasing vigilance, raising the immediate danger and forcing the group to act cautiously.
stakes_shift: Valerius's agents are actively hunting them, making their presence in the city precarious and escalating the conflict into a direct cat-and-mouse game.

bridge.from_prev: The group has formed an alliance and begun to plan their action against Valerius.
bridge.to_next: Eldrin undergoes a ritual to regain more of his power, preparing for the inevitable confrontation.

sections.title: Eyes in the Shadows
sections.intent: Show Valerius's agents actively searching for the group, creating tension.

scenes.summary: The group notices increased patrols and suspicious figures in the city, realizing Valerius's network is actively searching for them.
scenes.outcome: The group realizes Valerius's agents are actively hunting them, increasing their peril.

sections.title: Narrow Escape
sections.intent: A direct, tense encounter with Valerius's agents, showcasing the group's resourcefulness.

scenes.summary: A close call in the city's labyrinthine alleys forces the group to use their combined skills for a desperate escape.
scenes.outcome: The group narrowly escapes an ambush by Valerius's agents, confirming their enemy's awareness.

sections.title: A Hidden Sanctuary
sections.intent: The group finds a temporary, secure hiding place to regroup and plan.

scenes.summary: Seraphina leads them to a forgotten, hidden chamber beneath her archive, offering a temporary sanctuary from Valerius's reach.
scenes.outcome: The group finds a secret, temporary sanctuary to evade Valerius's pursuit.
